name: VEMT
tag_list: loyalty, coupons, giftcards, value, payments, vouchers, coupon, voucher, payment
overview:
VEMT is an Amsterdam, NL based company founded in 2005 and fully dedicated to providing innovative and robust Marketing Technology.

Its mission is to provide customers with a white labeled technology platform to enable them to achieve their commercial objectives in respect of loyalty, coupons, gift vouchers, employee benefits, ticketing and other marketing instruments in which value is exchanged.

The VEMT VX42 platform offers both standard solutions as well as customized solutions for corporate customers, ranging from customer service functionality, auditable tracking and tracing and reporting for financial and marketing analyses. Integration in SAP, POS or any other corporate network is offered.

VEMT understands both Marketing and Technology and translates marketing goals into practical and effective solutions that do not require a wide involvement with the clients’ IT-department.

VEMT has had a presence in London, United Kingdom since 2007.
